subject: [R] regarding SsfPack in Ox
body:
Hi All R Users,

I have a code in Ox language using its SSF Pack. Is there any similar 
package in R which provides all the same functionality.

Any pointers would be helpful to me.

Thanks in adv

-  Regards,
